title: Nurse-girlfriend says Patrick Frazee bashed finace's head with bat while playing blindfold game
itunes:title: Nurse-girlfriend says Patrick Frazee bashed finace's head with bat while playing blindfold game
description:
Patrick Frazee allegedly blindfolded Kelsey Berreth and asked her to try to guess what kind of candle she was smelling when he bashed her head with a baseball bat, according to the Colorado man's other girlfriend. That was just one of many gruesome revelations at Frazee's preliminary hearing for the Thanksgiving Day murder of Berreth. Nancy Grace looks at the newly-revealed evidence with a panel including  judge and lawyer Ashley Willcott, psychologist Dr. William July, private investigator Vincent Hill and reporter Ellen Killoran. Cajun Coast Search & Rescue Commander Toney Wade updates the search for missing Mississippi mom Danielle Nipper.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
